unnormalised: Yo, influencers and brand gurus! Heard about the latest analytics update? Apparently, follower analytics are getting a major glow-up. No more just guessing if your auntie Shakuntala from Patna is actually engaging with your content!
normalised: Yo, influencers and brand gurus! Heard about the latest analytics update? Apparently, follower analytics are getting a major glow-up. No more just guessing if your auntie Shakuntala from Patna is actually engaging with your content!

unnormalised: New tools are rolling out that promise to drill down into follower demographics like never before. Think age, location (beyond just state level!), interests… even how many times they’ve binged “Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.”
normalised: New tools are rolling out that promise to drill down into follower demographics like never before. Think age, location (beyond just state level!), interests… even how many times they’ve binged “Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.”

unnormalised: Companies like 'Desi Digital' are offering services that go deeper, analyzing purchase patterns linked to influencer collaborations. Is that Rs. 5000 kurta actually selling because of Komal's reel? Now you'll know!
normalised: Companies like 'Desi Digital' are offering services that go deeper, analyzing purchase patterns linked to influencer collaborations. Is that rupee five thousand kurta actually selling because of Komal's reel? Now you'll know!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIM Bangalore says this is a game-changer, giving marketers insights to target specific pin codes. Forget blanket campaigns, think hyper-localized targeting, like ads showing up only in areas with a high concentration of chai-lovers.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I M Bangalore says this is a game-changer, giving marketers insights to target specific pin codes. Forget blanket campaigns, think hyper-localized targeting, like ads showing up only in areas with a high concentration of chai-lovers.

unnormalised: Early reports suggest engagement is up by 15% for campaigns using these advanced analytics. Brands are claiming they're even able to identify fake followers more easily - bye bye bots!
normalised: Early reports suggest engagement is up by fifteen percent for campaigns using these advanced analytics. Brands are claiming they're even able to identify fake followers more easily - bye bye bots!

unnormalised: Some privacy concerns are being raised, naturally. But experts say it's all anonymized data, nothing creepy.
normalised: Some privacy concerns are being raised, naturally. But experts say it's all anonymized data, nothing creepy.

unnormalised: Imagine finally knowing if your Diwali giveaway actually reached your target audience in a 1000 sq ft apartment complex in Mumbai! Exciting times ahead!
normalised: Imagine finally knowing if your Diwali giveaway actually reached your target audience in a one thousand square feet apartment complex in Mumbai! Exciting times ahead!
